alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 2:45AM MST until February 15 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast to east winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Wasatch Front and Salt Lake Valley. Strongest winds are expected for typically wind prone areas and near canyons from Ogden Canyon to Millcreek Canyon. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult due to crosswinds, especially for high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy blowing snow from newly fallen snow may locally reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley
